| History                 = The Public Safety of the [[Republic of Santo Marco]] was tasked with controlling the people of Santo Marco. Under [[Alejandro de Jesus (Earth-616)|Alejandro de Jesus]]' orders, the people were enslaved for a quarter century. de Jesus had men broken, women disappeared and villages erased.{{r|Black Panther Vol 6 5}}

Due to de Jesus' efficiency at his tasks, he was brought together with other counterrevolutionary figures to [[Wakanda]] to help [[T'Challa (Earth-616)|King T'Challa]] formulate a course of action against his own country's revolt.{{r|Black Panther Vol 6 5}}
